name: EXIST
description: Have you ever invented your own worlds? Perhaps you managed to think out one of them so well that you literally immersed in it? Sometimes, when the soul is badly bad, you just want to take it and find yourself in a fantasy world where everything is fine, but there are no problems. But ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTFORCE 560 Storage: 2431 MB available space Sound Card: PCI-E Asus Xonar DSX Retail DSX/ASM
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTFORCE 710 Storage: 2431 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DG
